dublin_core.dcvalue: Lopes, Maria Helena Baena de Moraes

This research aimed to design implement and evaluate a distance learning course DLC using the Internet in a virtual environment named TelEduc Thirty eight nurses were invited 28 of whom registered and 17 concluded the course The specialists and the students evaluated the course and diagnostic pre test process and final post test evaluations were made Specialists in distance learning and wounds considered the course as adequate but recommended minor adjustments Most of the students showed a positive opinion about the course A comparison between pre and post test results showed that students scored better on the post test pUnder0 0001 The course reached its objectives although some adjustments are needed
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:33:10Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2006-03-13
[Development, implementation and evaluation of a distance course about wound treatment].
